body: Incredibly wholesome, the first story and it's second half in particular were fantastic but some of these really don't look of feel like "lolicon content".
this is censored man!!! such a mothersucking liar...
Do not tag comics as uncensored when it's not.

I like the first story arc, really vanilla, usually in real life with this type of relationship, the guy could have tried to wait until she is "legal age" like 16 (well at least in Asia and Europe). But otherwise, it not like he is forcing her and they seems to like each other alot so I guess it is okey, keeping it "hush hush"-
Personally, I love it. As long as its happy, consensual and fictitious, I'll read it. And I'll fap to it.
I like these stories, but I can't ever think the male character is truly a good guy considering he's screwing a kid.
